data.title: Outerbase | The interface for your database
data.description: Effortlessly manage and explore your database with AI, no expertise needed. Collaborate seamlessly for a smarter data experience.
data.content:

![Image 1: page background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/bg-cover.bc34804e.webp)

![Image 2: Satellite](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/bg-garnish.e3ed60f4.webp)

We make working  
with data easy
================================

With Outerbase's AI-powered platform, engineers, researchers,  
and analysts alike can work with any database—with safety  
and security guaranteed.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Get started for free](https://app.outerbase.com/)Book a Demo

AITablesQueriesDashboardsData Catalog

![Image 3: Ebay](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/ebay.69c45965.svg)![Image 4: Pinterest](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/pinterest.9dd805e8.svg)![Image 5: Arc](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/arc.a871d7ff.svg)![Image 6: Zapier](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/zapier.8fc21148.svg)![Image 7: Dribbble](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/dribbble.855541eb.svg)![Image 8: Justworks](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/justworks.369492bb.svg)![Image 9: Google](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/google.91d6b0db.svg)

AI

AI that knows your database
---------------------------

[Learn more about AI\-\>](https://www.outerbase.com/ai/)

### Ask EZQL™

Ask EZQL™ questions for instant insights about your data.

### AI-powered editor

Write queries with the help of AI to fix mistakes and make suggestions.

### Auto generate Charts

Transform your data into stunning visualizations instantly using AI.

![Image 10: Ai chat](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/ai-2-sm.e864f64b.webp)

### Ask EZQL™

Ask EZQL™ questions for instant insights about your data.

### AI-powered editor

Write queries with the help of AI to fix mistakes and make suggestions.

### Auto generate Charts

Transform your data into stunning visualizations instantly using AI.

Providers

Partnered with  
the best of the best
-------------------------------------

We connect instantly to the top database  
providers to make it even easier to access your data.

[DigitalOcean ![Image 11: Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/digitalocean-bg.7ac248ce.webp)](https://www.outerbase.com/connections/digitalocean/)[Neon ![Image 12: Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/neon-bg.7c5a1a5c.webp)](https://www.outerbase.com/connections/neon/)[Turso ![Image 13: Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/turso-bg.d1d2253a.webp)](https://www.outerbase.com/connections/turso/)

[Cloudflare ![Image 14: Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/cloudflare-bg.ccdec800.webp)](https://www.outerbase.com/connections/cloudflare/)[![Image 15: Place logo here](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/fruit-label.f41d0b3b.webp)![Image 16: Star so bright](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/star-sticker.7f0aa95b.svg)![Image 17: Star so bright](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/jet-sticker.dcccb5f6.webp) Interested in becoming a provider? ![Image 18: Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/add-bg.cdcc2f53.webp)](mailto:support@outerbase.com)

Tables

Navigate your data smarter
--------------------------

[Learn more about Tables\-\>](https://www.outerbase.com/tables/)

### Like a spreadsheet with more features

We built our table editor from scratch to be snappy, responsive, and comfortable.

### Customize with table plugins

A constantly expanding network of plugins to make navigating data faster and more effecient for your team.

### Embed our table everywhere

As part of our Astra library, the Outerbase table is fully embeddable anywhere.

![Image 19: Tables](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/tables-sm.0fd2d2f0.webp)

### Like a spreadsheet with more features

We built our table editor from scratch to be snappy, responsive, and comfortable.

### Customize with table plugins

A constantly expanding network of plugins to make navigating data faster and more effecient for your team.

### Embed our table everywhere

As part of our Astra library, the Outerbase table is fully embeddable anywhere.

Dashboards

Get insights instantly
----------------------

[Learn more about Dashboards\-\>](https://www.outerbase.com/dashboards/)

### Self-serve analytics

Build dashboards from the ground up or have AI build them for you.

### AI-generated charts

Generate charts directly in your conversations with AI.

### Embeddable analytics

Embed your charts anywhere with our open-source web components.

![Image 20: Dashboards](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/dashboards-2-sm.3a2c3fd6.webp)

### Self-serve analytics

Build dashboards from the ground up or have AI build them for you.

### AI-generated charts

Generate charts directly in your conversations with AI.

### Embeddable analytics

Embed your charts anywhere with our open-source web components.

Databases

Bring your  
own database
-------------------------

Connect to most SQL or NoSQL databases.  
All your data in one place.

[Postgres ![Image 21: Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/postgres-bg.39e1d063.webp)](https://www.outerbase.com/connections/postgres/)[MySQL ![Image 22: Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/mysql-bg.f8bc414f.webp)](https://www.outerbase.com/connections/mysql/)[SQLite ![Image 23: Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/sqlite-bg.9ee25646.webp)](https://www.outerbase.com/connections/sqlite/)[MongoDB ![Image 24: Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/mongo-bg.74827f33.webp)](https://www.outerbase.com/connections/mongodb/)[ClickHouse ![Image 25: Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/clickhouse-bg.df7b909e.webp)](https://www.outerbase.com/connections/clickhouse/)[Microsoft SQL Server ![Image 26: Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/ms-sql-server-bg.03509ab7.webp)](https://www.outerbase.com/connections/microsoft-sql-server/)[Snowflake ![Image 27: Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/snowflake-bg.f6b3e93a.webp)](https://www.outerbase.com/connections/snowflake/)[Google BigQuery ![Image 28: Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/bigquery-bg.9a786662.webp)](https://www.outerbase.com/connections/google-bigquery/)[Amazon Redshift ![Image 29: Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/redshift-bg.905c769f.webp)](https://www.outerbase.com/connections/amazon-redshift/)[View all databases ![Image 30: Background image](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/general-bg.fd3f506b.webp)](https://www.outerbase.com/connections/)

Data Catalog

Take control of your database
-----------------------------

[Learn more about Data Catalog\-\>](https://www.outerbase.com/data-catalog/)

### Define business terms

Define core business terms to help your team and AI understand key insights.

### View relational diagrams

Quickly create relational diagrams to help your team visualize how your data connects.

### Create virtual relationships

Add virtual relationships to your columns to increase understanding of data without editing the schema.

![Image 31: Data Catalog](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/data-catalog-1-sm.4db392db.webp)

### Define business terms

Define core business terms to help your team and AI understand key insights.

### View relational diagrams

Quickly create relational diagrams to help your team visualize how your data connects.

### Create virtual relationships

Add virtual relationships to your columns to increase understanding of data without editing the schema.

Secure at any scale
-------------------

Whether you are a fortune 500 or an indie dev your data  
privacy is our biggest priority.

[Learn more about security at Outerbase\-\>](https://www.outerbase.com/security/)

### Two-Factor Auth

Two step sign in process with your favorite authentication app.

### Data Breach Checks

We verify your password has not been exposed in any known data breaches.

### Custom Access

Restrict access at the lowest level using database roles and permissions.

### HIPAA Compliant

We protect patient health details, keeping them safe and confidential.

### SOC 2 Type 2 Compliant

We protect patient health details, keeping them safe and confidential.

### Data Encryption

Data is encrypted in using AES and RSA encryption algorithms.

### SSH Tunneling

Securely connect to your private database wherever it's located.

### Private AI Models

Our AI models are not trained on your data, keeping it private.

![Image 32: Space, at your fingertips](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/stars.d71684a3.webp)

![Image 33: astronaut](https://www.outerbase.com/_next/static/media/astronaut.59d23dff.webp)

What will  
you discover?
-------------------------

[Get started for free](https://app.outerbase.com/)Book a Demo

[All systems normal](https://outerbase.statuspage.io/)
